snippet: Phil Mickelson said in a statement on Saturday that he had no involvement in an insider trading investigation being conducted by the F.B.I., and reiterated that sentiment after his round.
abstract: Bubba Watson takes the lead into the final round of the Memorial Tournament, where he has never finished in the top 20; Phil Mickelson is likely to be the focus of the 114th United States Open, more than usual, because of federal investigation into insider trading.
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson said in a statement on Saturday that he had no involvement in an insider trading investigation being conducted by the F.B.I., and reiterated that sentiment after his round.

headline.main: Watson Holds Lead at Memorial, but Mickelson Garners More Attention
headline.print_headline: Watson Holds Lead at Memorial, but Mickelson Garners More Attention
